import { useState } from 'react' const Modal = () => { const option = 'create' const selectedOption = option === 'edit' ? true : false const [data, setData] = useState({ user_email: "", title: "", progress: "", date: selectedOption ? "" : new Date() }) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setData (data => ({ ...data, [name] : value })) console.log(data) } return (
Let's {option} your task
X
); } export default Modal;
